name: The Probability of Meltdown Is Minimal
name_original: The Probability of Meltdown Is Minimal
description:
Mechanic 0542. We've had a little problem and we need your help. Nothing out the ordinary - I'm sure you've seen worse on sewer duty. The generator had a little problem and it needs a quick fix. 

Management said you're small enough to fit in the tunnels and old enough that you can count past 10. I literally couldn't imagine someone better suited. Just pop on through, sort out that reactor and everything'll be just fine.

Oh, do watch out for the cleaning robots. They'll probably try and clean you if they have the chance, and we wouldn't want it impacting our safety rating. 

Good luck! 

---------------------

Controls - 

WASD to move

C or Ctrl to Crouch

Look at objects in environment to interact - if they're interactable, they will glow white, and left click to use.

--------------------

Patch 1.1 - Fixed menu resolution bug if not in 1920 x 1080. (I think).

--------------------

LD49 - theme of Unstable. Team was just me.

Game is nominally spooky - so if you think not up your street, then maybe avoid, although calling it scary is frankly a bit optimistic!

I tried to make a horror game - I think they’re super interesting - and whilst I like the concept, I think my execution is a little wide of the mark. I’m definitely glad I gave it a go, and whilst I achieved some of my goals, this is firmly in the I-could’ve-done-with-more-time category. Live and you learn!

twitter.com/cardthinker Follow me on the tweeter for sporadic updates on things I'm working on.
